definition: powder/cosmetic face powder/food prepared from starch/noodles or pasta made from any kind of flour/whitewash/white/pink

sentences.english: This kind of bone meal is from the animal dying of illness at first.
sentences.chinese: 這樣的肉骨粉是來自動物死亡的疾病在第一。

sentences.english: Methods Granule hydroxyapatite artificial bone dust was applied to perform operation of projecting forehead and nose.
sentences.chinese: 方法應用顆粒狀羥基磷灰石人工骨粉進行隆額隆鼻術。

sentences.english: Crushed bones make one of the best fertilizers.
First bone powder and bean dregs, and then wheat bran, maize, bone powder, and bean dregs were selected as protein diets in the experiment.
sentences.chinese: 利用規劃求解法篩選出肉骨粉和豆粕作爲供試蛋白源。

sentences.english: Meanwhile Meat Bone Meal is brown powder using fresh bovine bone and meat as raw material.
sentences.chinese: 肉骨粉呈棕褐色，以新鮮牛骨頭和肉爲原料。

sentences.english: Surely this is due to the superphosphate bone meal.
sentences.chinese: 這自然是過磷酸骨粉的功效。

sentences.english: If required, the addition of proprietary rose food or bone meal, into the base of the hole, should be done now.
sentences.chinese: 另外須在栽植坑的底部放一些月季專用肥料或骨粉。

sentences.english: Bone china porcelain is basically made by adding bone ash to kaolin and petuntse.
sentences.chinese: 骨瓷的基本成分是加入骨粉的高嶺土和白墩子。

definition: fertilizer for potted flowers/fertilizer used to promote flowering in crop plants
